derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek, from pneumōn 'lung'

entry.def: Pneumonia is a serious disease which affects your lungs and makes it difficult for you to breathe.

means.word_mean: 1. respiratory disease characterized by inflammation of the lung parenchyma (excluding the bronchi) with congestion caused by viruses or bacteria or irritants
